summary: ON TWO OCCASIONS, WHILE DRIVING BETWEEN 40-50 MILES PER HOUR, THE ENGINE STALLED -ONCE IN A CONSTRUCTION ZONE AREA.  LUCKILY, WE WERE ABLE TO TURN OFF ONTO A SIDE STREET, BUT JUST BARELY SINCE THE POWER STEERING WAS OUT. *AK    THE CAR HAS A HARD TIME STARTING.  IT REQUIRES STEPPING ON THE GAS PEDAL - JUST LIKE THE OLD DAYS.
